answers.answer: Hi there!Though a lot of patients would have moved to the higher dose, diabetes is best managed on the lowest possible dose even though one would see a significant improvement in symptoms. I would suggest discussing the management plan in detail with your treating endocrinologist.Hope this is helpful.Take care!

question: How many of you have progressed to the 1.8 dose?  I'm on the 1.2 dose.  Lost 5 lbs, but i am starting to get my appetite back.  Wondering it i should move up
title: Victoza 1.8
